info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 21 at 2:33AM MST until February 23 at 5:00AM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting 35 to 45 mph. * WHERE...Central Colorado River Basin. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult at times. Snow and blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility at times, especially in open areas. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Near whiteout conditions are likely at times due to snow and blowing snow. Thunderstorms are also possible on Wednesday which could lead to higher wind gusts.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
